about_the_game:
A story woven with the sound of rain, poetic text, and gentle narration... A short visual novel where you can spend a relaxing moment in your own place, with time to yourself, where no one will disturb you, no one will come barging in.

---Prologue---

I want my own place, with time to myself, where no one will disturb me, no one will come barging in.

I want my own time, my own place, where no one would disturb me, no one would come in here.

How lovely it would be if it were... a pleasant evening, with a fine gentle rain outside, in late May or June, surrounded by plants and their soft, natural aroma.

It could be a small, secretive café.

---Feature---

Atmospheric narration accompanied only by the sound of gentle rain
(Female Voice: Hota Kakeru / Male Voice: IMAYUI)
*Voice can be switched between female and male

  • Illustrations that convey a sense of story and warmth
    (Illustrator: Retro Nakamura)

  • An acoustic guitar and vocal performance as the ending theme.
    (Music: Hota Kakeru)

  • Poetic text by IMAYUI, a poet featured in the Japanese literary magazine "Eureka" and game director

  • The English localization was handled by Jordan A. Y. Smith, an expert in poetry translation.

  • A short story of approximately 15 to 20 minutes

  • Advance the text using the Enter key or mouse click

  • Adjustable volume, voice ON/OFF, save at any point, and backlog functionality

  • Feel free to turn off the voice and read aloud yourself

---About review, fan art, game commentary, and live broadcastse---

All welcome.

*Secondary use, sale and redistribution of any material taken from this game is prohibited.

*Unauthorized reproduction of this game in part or whole and unauthorized commercial use are prohibited.
